holdingRegisters.name: Unix Time
holdingRegisters.comment: Seconds from 1 January 1970 UTC. e.g. 02/29/2020 @ 3:15pm (UTC) represented as 1582989315.

holdingRegisters.name: Locate Electrolyser
holdingRegisters.comment: 1 = Start Blinking All LED; 0 = Stop Blinking All LED.

holdingRegisters.name: Maintenance Mode
holdingRegisters.comment: 1 = Enable Maintenance Mode; 0 = Disable Maintenance Mode.

holdingRegisters.name: Production Rate [%]
holdingRegisters.comment: Current production rate in percent (system reset set this value to 'Default Production Rate'), can be changed 'on-fly' even when electrolyser produce H2

holdingRegisters.name: Request Blowdown routine
holdingRegisters.comment: 1 = Request blowdown or read 'is blowdown requested'

holdingRegisters.name: Cloud logs
holdingRegisters.comment: 0 = disable logging (default); 1 = only fatal errors; 2 = fatal errors and errors; 3 = warnings and more important; 4 = everything before and important messages; 5 = all messages, except internal debug ones; 6 = all messages

holdingRegisters.name: System logs
holdingRegisters.comment: 0 = disable logging (default); 1 = only fatal errors; 2 = fatal errors and errors; 3 = warnings and more important; 4 = everything before and important messages; 5 = all messages, except internal debug ones; 6 = all messages

holdingRegisters.name: Set Default Production Rate [%]
holdingRegisters.comment: This register can be modified only when stack is inactive (Idle or Maintenance mode)

holdingRegisters.name: PT01 minimal threshold
holdingRegisters.comment: Dryer output pressure at which it will leave Stand-by

holdingRegisters.name: PT01 maximal threshold
holdingRegisters.comment: Dryer output pressure at which it will move to Stand-by

holdingRegisters.name: Start/Stop Dryer
holdingRegisters.comment: Write: 1 = Start; 0 = Stop; Read until: ≠ 259 - command handled for start; Read until: = 259 - command handled for stop

holdingRegisters.name: Stop Dryer
holdingRegisters.comment: Write: 1 = Stop; Read until: = 259 - command handled

holdingRegisters.name: Turn ON or OFF F104 (V106 for LC version)

inputRegisters.name: Chassis Serial Number
inputRegisters.comment: 1 bits - reserved, must be 0;10 bits - Product Unicode;11 bits - Year + Month;5 bits - Day;24 bits - Chassis Number;5 bits - Order;8 bits - Site Example

inputRegisters.name: System State
inputRegisters.comment: 0 = Internal Error, System not Initialized yet; 1 = System in Operation; 2 = Error; 3 = System in Maintenance Mode; 4 = Fatal Error; 5 = System in Expert Mode.

inputRegisters.name: Live time [seconds]
inputRegisters.comment: Total time during which a system is power up (not only time when stack is working).

inputRegisters.name: Uptime [seconds]
inputRegisters.comment: How long the system has been running

inputRegisters.name: Available memory
inputRegisters.comment: Memory which has not been allocated yet

inputRegisters.name: Free space on flash-card
inputRegisters.comment: Space on flash-card where the configuration is

inputRegisters.name: Warning Events Array
inputRegisters.comment: Warning Events Array represented by Error Codes. First Uint16 contains total quantity of Warning Events.

inputRegisters.name: Error Events Array
inputRegisters.comment: Error Events Array represented by Error Codes. First Uint16 contains total quantity of Error Events.

inputRegisters.name: Stack Serial Number
inputRegisters.comment: 1 bits - reserved, must be 0;15 bits - Stack Type;11 bits - Year + Month;29 bits - Stack Number;8 bits - Site

inputRegisters.name: H2 Flow Rate
inputRegisters.comment: NL/hour, NAN when not producing H2;

inputRegisters.name: Electrolyser State
inputRegisters.comment: 0 = Halted; 1= Maintenance mode; 2 = Idle; 3 = Steady; 4 = Stand-By (Max Pressure); 5 = Curve; 6 = Blowdown.

inputRegisters.name: Last Configuration Result
inputRegisters.comment: 0 = OK, Configuration was completed successfully; 1 = Permanent, The operation has failed (internal or general error); 2 = No Entry, Configuration was not started or interrupted; 5 = I/O, Data save error; 11 - Try again, Configuration needs to be tried again; 13 = Access Denied, Some changed registers are read-only; 16 = Busy, Another configuration was in progress; 22 = Invalid, The data has invalid or wrong type.

inputRegisters.name: Last Configuration Wrong Holding
inputRegisters.comment: Keeps first invalid Holding register number which doesn't allow successful configuration commit.

inputRegisters.name: Heartbeat
inputRegisters.comment: Timeout for Modbus Heartbeat in seconds. 0 = disabled (default)

inputRegisters.name: Dryer TT00
inputRegisters.comment: Temperature of heater element for cartridge 0 (first line).

inputRegisters.name: Dryer TT01
inputRegisters.comment: Temperature of heater element for cartridge 1 (second line).

inputRegisters.name: Dryer TT02
inputRegisters.comment: Temperature of heater element for cartridge 2 (first line).

inputRegisters.name: Dryer TT03
inputRegisters.comment: Temperature of heater element for cartridge 3 (second line).

inputRegisters.name: 3 OUI octets for Wi-Fi MAC address
3 NIC octets for Wi-Fi MAC address
High Electrolyte Level Switch (LSH102B_in)
inputRegisters.comment: 1 = Electrolyte level over sensor; 0 = Electrolyte level below sensor.

inputRegisters.name: Very High Electrolyte Level Switch (LSHH102A_in)
inputRegisters.comment: 1 = Electrolyte level over sensor; 0 = Electrolyte level below sensor.

inputRegisters.name: Low Electrolyte Level Switch (LSL102D_in)
inputRegisters.comment: 1 = Electrolyte level over sensor; 0 = Electrolyte level below sensor.

inputRegisters.name: Medium Electrolyte Level Switch (LSM102C_in)
inputRegisters.comment: 1 = Electrolyte level over sensor; 0 = Electrolyte level below sensor.

inputRegisters.name: Electrolyte Tank High Pressure Switch (PSH102_in)
inputRegisters.comment: 1 = Pressure is too high; 0 = Pressure is normal.

inputRegisters.name: Very High Hydrogen Pressure Switch (PSHH101B_in)
inputRegisters.comment: 1 = Pressure is too high; 0 = Pressure is normal.

inputRegisters.name: Downstream High Temperature Switch (TSH106_in)
inputRegisters.comment: 1 = Temperature is too high. 0 = Temperature is normal.

inputRegisters.name: Electronic Compartment High Temperature Switch (TSH108_in)
inputRegisters.comment: 1 = Temperature is too high. 0 = Temperature is normal.

inputRegisters.name: Very Low Electrolyte Temperature Switch (TSLL102B_in)
inputRegisters.comment: 1 = Temperature is too low. 0 = Temperature is normal.

inputRegisters.name: Chassis Water Presence Switch (WPS104_in)
inputRegisters.comment: 1 = Water is present on input; 0 = No water input.

inputRegisters.name: Inner Hydrogen Pressure Raw Sensor Value (PT101A_in_v)
Outer Hydrogen Pressure Raw Sensor Value (PT101C_in_v)
